tagline: Your ideal partner for comfortable stays and professional event hosting.
languagesSupported: Available in English, Oromo, and Amharic.

paymentDetailsPageDescription: Follow the instructions below to complete your payment via bank transfer.
paymentReferenceNote: Please use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference/reason.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the payment, please send a screenshot or photo of your payment confirmation to our Telegram bot {botUsername} or directly to the number {phoneNumber}. Don't forget to include your Booking ID.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After sending proof, an admin will verify your payment and approve your booking.
errorFetchingBookingDetails: Error fetching booking details. Please try again or contact support.
missingBookingId: Booking ID is missing. Cannot display payment details.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your payment proof has been noted. An admin will verify it soon via Telegram. Your booking is pending final approval.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you! Your booking request for the facility has been received and will be reviewed by our team shortly. We will contact you for further steps including payment and agreement.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request has been received. Please complete the payment using the details below and send proof via Telegram for approval.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please contact support if this issue persists.

contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help! Reach out to us through any of the channels below.

generalInquiriesDesc: For all other questions or assistance:
addressPlaceholder: Oromia Educational Bureau, Sarbet, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
mapPlaceholder: Google Maps embed will be here.
adminPaymentReferenceNote: This account is for facility rentals. Dormitory payments use the main site account and are verified via Telegram.
bankDetailsForPaymentVerification: For facility rental payments, please use the details below. Verify other payments as instructed.

errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.

phoneForTelegramIdentification: This phone number will be used for Telegram identification and payment verification.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: This phone number can be used for Telegram identification if needed.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book more than one dormitory room on the same day with the same phone number.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration is required to prevent duplicate bookings. Please contact support.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: A check for duplicate bookings was skipped due to a database configuration. Your booking will proceed, but please ensure you have not already booked for this date.
errorCalculatingTotalCostNaN: Error calculating total cost. Please check inputs.
providerAddressPlaceholder: Oromia Education Bureau Main Office, Addis Ababa
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement or as per pre-agreed terms for credit clients.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than 72 hours before the event start date may incur a fee of 50% of the total booking cost. Cancellations made less than 24 hours may result in forfeiture of the full amount.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Damages: The Client is responsible for any damages caused to the facility or equipment by their attendees or staff.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Usage: The facility is to be used only for the purpose stated in the booking. Any changes require prior approval.
thankYouForBusiness: Thank you for choosing our services!
agreementNotApplicable: An agreement document is not applicable for this type of booking.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below or visit our brochure page to learn more about our center and services.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Affordable and secure accommodation for individuals and groups.
brochureHallsDesc: Modern spaces perfect for meetings, trainings, workshops, and events.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and customizable catering options for your events.
brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} is a premier center dedicated to providing high-quality educational training, research facilities, and versatile rental services. We aim to support learning, collaboration, and professional development by offering top-notch accommodation and event spaces. Our commitment is to excellence, customer satisfaction, and fostering an environment conducive to growth and success. We are strategically located to serve your needs with convenience and professionalism.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and many more amenities designed for your comfort and convenience.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Dedication to quality and creating a productive environment.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Visit Us
brochureCallToActionDesc: We are excited to host you or your event. Contact us today to discuss your requirements or to arrange a visit.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page has been updated or replaced. Please use the main navigation to find what you're looking for.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement is not applicable or not yet ready for this booking. Ensure the booking is for a facility and has been approved.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter any custom terms or modifications here. These will replace the default terms for this specific agreement.
editTermsNote: Note: Editing these terms will only affect this specific agreement. Default terms will be used if this field is empty.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: Access Denied. You do not have permission to view this agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet ready for viewing by the client, or it's not applicable for this booking.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as a company representative to view this agreement.
agreementUploadedSuccessfully: The signed agreement has been uploaded and the booking status updated.
errorUploadingAgreementActual: An error occurred while uploading the agreement file. Please try again.
failedToUploadToCloudinary: Failed to upload file to cloud storage.
selectReportTypeAndDateRange: Select a report type. These reports are generally for download.
